name: Gap Consulting
description:
At Gap Consulting, we live and breathe Microsoft Dynamics™ CRM. From standard, compact CRM projects to complex 'xRM' on the Microsoft Dynamics™ CRM platform, we have the expertise to deliver the right solution for you.

We are currently working with the new Beta release of Microsoft Dynamics™ CRM 2011; upgrading our add-ons and accelerators, and demoing to our customers and prospects. If you would like to know more about 'CRM 2011', please see its new features in our 2011 pages.
We have specialist experience in Financial Services, Professional Services and Not for Profit/Membership Management, where Microsoft Dynamics™ CRM is the ideal platform for delivering more complex and specific relationship management requirements.
We have been wholly focused on Microsoft Dynamics™ CRM since 2005, leaving behind our Siebel CRM eBusiness Solutions roots, and pursuing what we believe has become the leading choice of CRM solution for the modern Enterprise. No longer are businesses faced with lengthy and expensive CRM implementation projects, poor integration with desktop tools and complete reliance on consultancy resource. Microsoft Dynamics™ CRM addresses all these common CRM issues and more, giving you an intuitive and familiar interface that is flexible enough to emulate your business needs.
